name: Garbage Truck: Dumpster Pick Up
summary:
Garbage Truck: Dumpster Pick Up 
 
A classic favorite of Garbage Truck loving kids! 
 
A fun and cute interactive app for Kids! 
 
Ride along on a front loading garbage truck as it drives through a neighborhood and stops to pick up dumpsters at local businesses. Help the garbage man pick up the dumpsters in the big dumpster truck. After three dumpsters, visit the Landfill to empty the truck! 
 
A real treat for those little garbage truck enthusiasts and a great way to encourage curiosity and interaction for all. Touch the driver and he honks the horn. Touch a cloud as it passes by and it smiles and hums. The neighborhood is interactive. When your child touches people, animals, or objects they make sounds and perform actions. Its like a moving story book! 
 
A great way to explore the sights and sounds of a Dumpster Pick Up Garbage Truck! 
 
*Compatible with: iPod Touch 3 & 4 generation, iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4, iPhone 5, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus and all iPads 
 
----------------------------------------------- 
 
*Note: NOT Compatible with: First generation iPhone, iPhone 3G, and iPod Touch 1st & 2nd generation. 
 
-----------------------------------------------
